responses: Here it is all you need to do, Drink warm water,keep yourself hydrated,Take haldi-milk twice a day,try to stay home,if temperature is high then have calpol paracetamol 500mg tablet after meal and dinner

responses: Your symptoms shows u have Asthma, don't panic and for detail diagnosing please visit pulmonologist. They can treat you with your lungs and respiratory issues. If u need any further assistance feel free to ask.

patterns: I feel uneasy, fear and worry,difficulty concentrating,restlessness

responses: Its a clear sign of Anxiety, for this you need someone to talk to someone or you need to share your feelings and emotions, You should consult a Therapist. Take care and Not to worry.

patterns: I am having red rashes , fever and itchiness

i am having fever, muscle pain,red spots on my hands, face and all over my body i am scared what it might be?
responses: What i see u are facing is mild illness considered as Chickenpox, u need to stay indoor as virus should not spread much, do not scratch the spots as it can be incredibly itchy,wear cool clothing, keep yourself hydrated, if there is a sever and spreading infection, you must visit a nearby doctor.
